thread.title: Brooklyn Decker And Andy Roddick Welcome Their First Child
thread.title_full: Brooklyn Decker And Andy Roddick Welcome Their First Child

title: Brooklyn Decker And Andy Roddick Welcome Their First Child
text:
Brooklyn Decker And Andy Roddick Welcome Their First Child Brooklyn Decker And Andy Roddick Welcome Their First Child Brooklyn Decker Andy Roddick 
Decker gave birth to a boy in Texas on Wednesday this week, reports reveal. 
Actress Brooklyn Decker and former tennis pro Andy Roddick welcomed their first child, a baby boy, into the world earlier this week, it has been announced. 
People broke the story on Sunday evening that the couple had become parents on Wednesday (September 30th), with Decker giving birth in Austin, Texas to a boy, according to Us Weekly . Representatives for the pair have not yet announced their son’s name, however. Brooklyn Decker and her husband Andy Roddick, who have just welcomed their first child, pictured in May 2015 
The couple, who have been married since 2009, announced the news that they were expecting a baby back in May. At the time, the 28 year old star of What to Expect When You’re Expecting revealed her condition via an Instagram picture of her cradling her baby bump. She wrote: “So this happened… #the3ofus”, and ever since she’s been keeping fans abreast of her condition with a series of selfies. 
At the same time, 33 year old Roddick was asked by People about what thought they had given to baby names, but they were as tight-lipped then as they are now, also saying that they intended to keep the sex of the baby a secret until it was born. “The name is still debatable… We’re open to any and all suggestions. We’re going to figure it out as we go.” 
Last year, Decker had confessed that she was excited to start a family, having been married for five years, now that her husband, a former world number one, had quit professional tennis after an injury-plagued end to his career. 
“He’s just the most clever person I’ve ever met,” she gushed last year. “He has such a quick mind… He’s so clever, and his humour is very snarky. It always makes me laugh.”
